content:
# The command to move to the nearest stone resource patch has executed successfully. 

# Now, I will proceed to harvest stone from this resource patch. Let's aim to collect at least 10 units of stone, as this will allow us to craft the stone furnace and have some leftover for future use.

# Harvest stone from the resource patch.
harvested_stone = harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.Stone), quantity=10)
assert harvested_stone == 10, f"Expected to harvest 10 stone, but harvested {harvested_stone} instead."  # Ensure we harvested the right amount.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
